A

A Minimal Music Player Powered by YouTube

  1. Copy and Paste the Existing Embed Code Provided by YouTube & Edit the width and height so that they are the same values
<iframe width="600" height="600" src="//www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/_-Qpj-bNidA" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
  1. Remove toolbars, related content, and progress bar by appending the following snippet just after the end of the src link.
?rel=0;3&amp;autohide=1&amp;showinfo=0
by Al Hertz

Built using Jekyll and hosted on Github Pages.
